name: Tales Of Blocksburg: Zombie Shooting
description:
Just a simple zombie shooting gallery I made in 3 day to see if I can make a VR game on the weekend. Simple game just hover over start button and click the trigger to start the game and have 1 min to get the highest score that you can. Only tested on HTC Vive.

Music Credits:

"Robobozo" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
